forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a promising serenity, brightened by a golden sun that paints a crisp landscape. The temperature hovers around a comfortable sixty-four degrees, a gentle reminder of the season’s warmth tempered by a refreshing west wind. As the breeze rustles through the bustling streets, you may feel it may dance with an enjoyable intensity of fourteen to seventeen miles per hour, punctuated by sporadic, playful gusts nudging at twenty-one. There’s a distinct clarity to the day; the horizon reveals the city’s iconic skyline and the undulating hills that cradle it, offering a stunning backdrop for any activity.

As twilight approaches and night drapes softly over the city, expect mostly clear skies, with the temperature dipping to around fifty-one. A casual sweater or a light jacket will suffice as you venture out for an evening stroll or perhaps indulge in some café culture. For those looking to embrace the outdoors, consider a visit to a local park or a charming walk along the waterfront, where the twilight reflections of the city shimmer in the bay. This recipe of pleasant conditions beckons one to explore the city’s hidden corners or simply bask in its tranquility by enjoying a book in a cozy café, allowing the day’s golden moments to linger just a little longer.
